channel.title: REQUEST all your menus and commands here!
channel.description:
This topic is for helping people who wanna make awesome server/menu and don't care of java.So I'm creating commands/menus for free and i'm telling them where to put it if they only give me some info like :
1.The In-game menu tittle 2.How many menu lines you want? 3.Colored lines? ( what colors) 4.How to open the menu ( by a command or by clicking a stat ) 5.The menu Interface ( VERY optional ) 6.If you have choosen a command - the command's name 7. if you have choosen a skill - the skill name
This is like a small TuT for helping ppl i hope many ppl will enjoy it and 1 last thing : IF YOU WANT A GOOD PRIVATE SERVER - START LEARNING JAVA!!!
-Alex

item.title: REQUEST all your menus and commands here!
item.dc:creator: @green_dude green dude
item.description:
@green_dude wrote:

Wait im dowloading it now so i can tell you.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 12:39:07 PM[/size][hr]Ok got it.Open your client.java and search for :

public void ServerHelp() {

So that’s the void you need.Change all the stuff you want as I told you.Tell me if it works[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 12:41:32 PM[/size][hr]Look i have to eat !now! so ill be goin for a while - tell me if you got any probs.Ill be back in 10 mins[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 12:44:16 PM[/size][hr]soooo…it works?

item.title: REQUEST all your menus and commands here!
item.dc:creator: @green_dude green dude
item.description:
@green_dude wrote:

Ok I think you are talking for the first menu that you see when u run ur server.I’ll give u a tut so if you follow it correctly it should really help.
Search for this in your client.JAVA :

public void MainHelpMenu()

Now you should see something like this :

[Code]public void MainHelpMenu()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@Main Help Menu", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to Testscape", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Made by Nvi ible@dbl@", 8147);
                sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ No Website yet @dbl@", 8148);
				sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@ A few commands", 8150);
				sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::yell@dre@ Tells everyone a message you send.@dbl@", 8151);
			        sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::fish2@dre@ Another place for high lvl fishers.@dbl@", 8152);
				sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::fish@dre@ This takes you to Varrock to fish at the Fountain.@dbl@", 8153);
					sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::startmine1@dre@ Takes you to mining start spot 1.@dbl@",8154);
					sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::players@dre@ This tells you how many people are playing.@dbl@", 8155);
					sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::mypos@dre@ This tells you your current location.@dbl@", 8156);
					sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::empty@dre@ Clears items from your backpack.@dbl@", 8157);
					sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::pass@dre@ Sets a new password for your account.@dbl@", 8158);
					sendQuest("@dbl@:::::::::Other Menus:::::::::", 8160); 
							
                               	sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::slayermenu@dre@ For info on slayer features.@dbl@", 8161);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::theifmenu@dre@ For info on theiving features@dbl@", 8162);
				 sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::fletchinghelp@dre@ for help with the fletching skill@dbl@", 8163);
				 sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::servermenu@dre@ Opens a menu showing you server commands.@dbl@", 8164);
				sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::moneymenu@dre@ for help making money.@dbl@", 8165);
				sendQuest("@dbl@Type @dre@::shopmenu@dre@ for help finding shops.@dbl@", 8166);
				sendQuest("@dre@-----ADMINS-----", 8167);
				sendQuest("@dbl@Owner:@dre@Admin (or Nvi ible).", 8168);
				sendQuest("@dbl@Staff Mods(Gold Crown):@dre@Stoned4life1, Base,", 8169);
				sendQuest("@dre@Albel Nox,bdawgx,@dbl@and@dre@Lemonslayer.", 8170);
				sendQuest("@dbl@Player Mods(Silver Crown):@dre@Juggalo269.", 8171);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
	
			}[/Code]

Now you need to edit all the stuff about the owner,menus,mods and etc.ONLY THIS!DO NOT CHANGE ANY OTHER THINGS!Then save your client.java,compile,run and try.This one should work

-Alex

Read full topic
